docs.text: Code reference Utility functions say_hello ( n_times = 1 ) print hello string Parameters: Name Type Description Default n_times int number of times to print. Defaults to 1. 1 Source code in chopit/utils.py def say_hello ( n_times : int = 1 ): """ print hello string Args: n_times (int, optional): number of times to print. Defaults to 1. """ for idx in range ( n_times ): print ( f 'Hello { idx } ' )
